methods.doc:
Builds Net::HTTPRequest with specified method, url, headers, body, form data,
query params, basic auth or bearer token. Forces SSL mode

args.type: Ksplat[:headers? => HashOf[Or[String, Symbol], Or[String, Integer]], :body? => Or[HashOf[Or[Symbol, String], Or[Integer, Float, Bool, String, Hash, Array]], String, File], :form_data? => HashOf[Or[Symbol, String], Or[Integer, Float, Bool, String, Array, File]], :query_params? => HashOf[Or[String, Symbol], Or[String, Integer]], :force_ssl? => Bool, :basic_auth? => {:username => String, :password => String}, :bearer_token? => String]
